#jQuery Maps 1.3.

= Introduction =

With jQuery Map 1.3, the intention is to turn the plugin from a Google Map plugin to a Map framework that supports Google Maps, Yahoo! Maps and Microsoft Live Maps.


= Details =

To initialize a map, the current way to do it is like this:

{{{
$('#mymap').jmap();
}}}

This creates a Google map.  This will remain the default action.

To create a Yahoo! map, it will simply be a variable passed in:

{{{
$('#mymap').jmap({maptype: "yahoo"});
}}}

For a Microsoft Live map:

{{{
$('#mymap').jmap({maptype: "mlive"});
}}}


When the map type is currently initialized, it is available as $().GMap2, which is the Google Map API.  THis will be changed to a generic object, jMap.  Selection will be done from a switch like this:

{{{
switch settings.maptype {
    case "yahoo":
        var jmap = this.jMap = new YMap(this);
    case "mlive":
        /// Have not found MS API Yet.
    case default:
        var jmap = this.jMap = new GMap2(this);
        break;
}
}}}
